instructions: Open the Google Maps app using your Google account. Tap the Menu button. Tap Settings . Tap Maps History . To see your entire Maps history, type Maps in the search field and tap Done . Tap Filter by date and enter a date range (or leave as All Time ). Choose Apply . Tap the vertical menu (three dots vertically placed on the upper right of the search results). Tap Delete Results to get rid of all of your history. Tape Delete again to confirm. To delete individual items from your search history, scroll to the item and tap the vertical menu (three dots vertically placed on the upper right of each item). This is the same as on Android. Tap Delete next to each entry you want to be removed. Continue doing this for each item you want to be removed if you also want to keep some items.
